explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the application of a convolutional neural network (CNN) for financial risk prediction, which is a machine learning technique.
explanations.classification: The paper proposes a binary classification prediction model for financial risk, indicating the use of classification techniques.
explanations.neural network: The research applies convolutional neural networks (CNNs) and mentions LSTM modules, both of which are types of neural networks.
explanations.deep learning: The use of CNN and LSTM modules indicates the application of deep learning techniques.
explanations.convolutional neural network: The paper explicitly mentions the use of a convolutional neural network (CNN) for financial risk management.
explanations.CNN: The paper applies a convolutional neural network (CNN) for financial risk prediction and management.
explanations.long short-term memory: The paper mentions the use of an LSTM module as part of the proposed model.
explanations.LSTM: The paper includes an LSTM module in the proposed model for financial risk prediction.
explanations.encoder-decoder: The paper refers to an encoder module as part of the model, which is a component of encoder-decoder architectures.
explanations.attention mechanism: The paper proposes a model based on a sparse attention mechanism, indicating the use of attention techniques.
